name: consortium of CERN and large European national laboratories with accelerator driven research infrastructures and major detector development effort
goal: Coordinate actions in R&D and construction of accelerators and associated detection systems in strong links with CERN
euInitiatives: ESFRI, Horizon 2020, FP9, AMICI, ARIES, EuroCirCol, EuPraxia, FuSuMaTech, EASYTrain
